full_threads.body:
[image: Google Workspace]
<https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/#m_-7729409296563268928_>
Your Google Workspace monthly invoice is available. Please find the PDF
document attached at the bottom of this email.
IMPORTANT: The balance will be automatically charged so you don't need to
take any action.
Domain thepcg.com.au
Name Wolf IQ
Invoice number 5241625502
Payments profile ID 5093-0741-4910
If you want to view your payment history or update your payment info, visit
your account by following the instructions below:

1. Sign in to your Admin console at admin.google.com
<https://c.gle/ANiao5oRgY0p_SOAyE6uW16-3N18NilzYAc3fs9Xxg4hPDA2wmhG8bwv_1CssbMHrDo1LXvpXqW-4LriiV8Rc44e4PpW97-AS7EY2k-kNTN1WdyicbdS7sM>
.
If you have trouble signing in, refer to this
<https://c.gle/ANiao5qpqf3JB22TrDjwTOdk2VNzf6VXf7dDYbC9DBS5kRKrKVocne4X0YGDt5-3JbPdPi2-7qzkhqYeh_-BDGKlbr_yK5UJId6VWqAR1sI9Z3drwDsWVDAIVF-wEs0OHDbqjQjJ2p12b8Q>
help article.
2. In the top left corner of your Admin console, click *Main menu >
Billing > Payment accounts*.
3. Click the account ID of your Google Workspace subscription.

If you see a *Red Alert* at the top of the page, select the alert to fix
any issues with your primary payment method or billing contacts.
To review your current subscriptions, payment plans, and other relevant
details, go to the Subscriptions page in the Admin console
<https://c.gle/ANiao5p_1GsznBR5-QYg45q0RZ40uTwX2DGBKXhsqJYIkMJBaClTyWojSvAaQa1yBIL5j5iiVmB5sQwENM2cx7B1OLvxnJ2vtqDwn5tbIcplj1bw3nSf-Q9GMpwocHgQWDukOCNVCfndTBRYZxxlYJu2>.

Learn more about your Workspace invoice and charges
<https://c.gle/ANiao5rxJS1Fb2Z9Md7APaKnHPo6PreCBr-FL8KnkQ8PUBcDECiIDRwOCxxK0-RjvXue7ial9vAf7FEEQTVZm6XR1cwLkC5N4L-lUa4SGIA8dR0ReC9jKBtkhb8A5brvHD0cZ0O0QoXTtMZU>
